text: Dangerous Game is a 1993 erotic movie. Harvey Keitel plays Eddie Israel. Madonna plays Sarah Jennings. The movie is about a movie director based in New York City. The director has Sarah Jennings acting in a Hollywood marital- crisis drama movie. This movie was released on November 19, 1993 in the United States. It got mixed reviews by movie critics. Rotten Tomatoes gave it a score of 29% based on 14 critic's reviews. It was rated R by the Motion Picture Association of America (MPAA). It contains violence, profanity, sexual situations and nudity. == References == ==Other websites== * * * Category:1993 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Italian movies Category:Movies directed by Abel Ferrara Category:American independent movies
title: Dangerous Game (movie)
